name: RC Buggy Racing - Xtreme Offroad Edition
name_original: RC Buggy Racing - Xtreme Offroad Edition
description:
RC Buggy Race is a fast, action 3D race game! With realistic 3D graphics, easy controls, and lots of action, you will not be able to stop playing!

Are you ready to play? Lets go!

FEATURES

- Super easy tilt controls.
- Realistic 3D graphics.
- Cool soundtrack.
- Game center support.
